title: I got banned for just calling a person a kid and being a LITTLE salty
body:
I don't accept getting banned still, I was called a stupid bitch by this morgana for going in late, I was still at base in aram and then i called the morg a kid and then she was insulting me the whole way, I didn't want to be a chicken and mute them, That was my bad but that is still rude of him/her to call me a stupid bitch, I was in base and walking to the group fight, They started without me and i came in late and then the morg called me useless so did the gragas and then i afked and told the gragas, I won't fight, Cuz i didn't want the morg to blow its head out and then the gragas said ''HAHA ZOE WE DON'T NEED YOU WE WON THIS FIGHT CUZ U WEREN'T HERE'' And then i didn't fight nad then they got salty at me for not fighting? Like make up your mind
Game 1
In-Game
BubblegumBish: lag
BubblegumBish: xD
BubblegumBish: lulu is shitt from close range
BubblegumBish: if anyone can get close to her she is fuckked
BubblegumBish: WTF
BubblegumBish: HOW
BubblegumBish: wat
BubblegumBish: ._.
BubblegumBish: ffs i can't play with fake nails on
BubblegumBish: gay asf
BubblegumBish: such a pain to play with long nails
BubblegumBish: ddis thot
BubblegumBish: why
BubblegumBish: is the water
BubblegumBish: purple
BubblegumBish: ??
BubblegumBish: my god dis is atually gey
BubblegumBish: ffs syndra does so much
BubblegumBish: I need to kill dat god amn syndrome
BubblegumBish: syndra*
BubblegumBish: ;-;
BubblegumBish: wtf
BubblegumBish: is this
BubblegumBish: gayness
BubblegumBish: stfu
BubblegumBish: i was still walkin htere
BubblegumBish: Never said i could raging 5 year old UwU
BubblegumBish: Raging child
BubblegumBish: Oh so its better to be afk? alright
BubblegumBish: :)
BubblegumBish: i guess i can't play
BubblegumBish: as this morg says
BubblegumBish: I don't want to trigger the child
BubblegumBish: the child is already triggered enough
BubblegumBish: I can't let his head explode
BubblegumBish: It isn't?
BubblegumBish: I'm just helping this morg calm down
BubblegumBish: never said you did?
BubblegumBish: my god this team is salty as UwU
BubblegumBish: Kid i never said i needed to
BubblegumBish: As said salty
BubblegumBish: Its called letting morg calm down
BubblegumBish: Then tell them how you called me a stupid bitch when i was still walking and you guys just started the fight
BubblegumBish: Weak
BubblegumBish: mhmm..
Post-Game
BubblegumBish: Well sorry 'stupid bitch' callin kiddo
(The morg called me a stupid bitch) I was saying that syndra does alot of dmg for 200 ap and i do no dmg so i got a lil salty, I had acrylic nails on which pissed me off i snapped my middle fingers fake nail off and then it was soo painful, And im used to writing syndrome cuz my uncle has a syndrome which he is, Yeah i can't say cuz i'll start crying ;-; I was saying why is syndras q water ball purple and not blue cuz i remembered it was blue, And i just said child, I didn't swear say the rude words and things...Sooo ye...I calle syndra a thot cuz i was a LIL salty that she does SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO much more dmg then me, And i do no dmg

replies.body: You should be banned for playing ARAM unironically
Well yeah aram, But not the other ones, Like what if someone can't play a champ they bought and they're new to it? Someone can just get salty really easily and burst out their heads

Why do you use the word gay to describe so many things?  Perhave that is why you were banned.

A writing syndrome? what is that? try to think a little bit before you write, rather than spewing out your emotion and calling it a syndrome "Some people now aday, any small quirk = a sickness".

if u read properly it says shes use to writing syndrome by habit as her uncle has a syndrome as muscle memory thing, as u can tell she corrects it to syndra ^^ what u said was insensitive and u misunderstood.

It hard to read a sentence that just flow on and on using comma, and she doesnt even use footstop to end. So forgive me if i misunderstood the content. 

Am guessing you know this girl? There are infomation you've put up that are not part of the post. Why dont you tell her to fix this bad habbit she got going for her eh?
im not her friend it states it in the post O-O

>And im used to writing syndrome **cuz my uncle has a syndrome which he is**

-

>shes use to writing syndrome by **habit** as her uncle has a syndrome as **muscle memory** thing

Am confuse. I dont understand how you've extracted her saying, her uncle has a syndrome, to muscle memory.
its quite obvious as shes said she used to writing it so without thinking she wrote it which is muscle memory, duh

What amazing is, from a series of broken english sentences; You've managed to understood the symptom of her uncle. 

I've gathered enough info to deduct she wrote syndrome out of habbit. But what i dont understand was her phrase of using.

>And im used to writing syndrome cuz my uncle has a syndrome which he is, Yeah i can't say cuz i'll start crying 

Ok, so what is she implying here? She got that habbit because her uncle has a syndrome? and remembering it make her tear up? 

>if u read properly it says shes use to **writing **syndrome by **habit** as her **uncle** **has **a **syndrome **as **muscle memory** thing, as u can tell she corrects it to syndra ^^ what u said was **insensitive **and u **misunderstood**.

I dont understand your words very well either. 

Sound like a bunch of excuses for not studying english.

> [{quoted}](name=BubblegumBish,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=AcNhETNd,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-10-04T02:28:01.814+0000)
>


> BubblegumBish: ffs syndra does so much
> BubblegumBish: I need to kill dat god amn syndrome
> BubblegumBish: syndra*
> BubblegumBish: ;-;
And im used to writing syndrome cuz my uncle has a syndrome which he is, Yeah i can&#039;t say cuz i&#039;ll start crying ;-; I was saying why is syndras q water ball purple and not blue cuz i remembered it was blue, And i just said child, I didn&#039;t swear say the rude words and things...Sooo ye...I calle syndra a thot cuz i was a LIL salty that she does SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO much more dmg then me, And i do no dmg

It's gotta be your use of the word "gay". In this overly PC world, it's unacceptable.

I remember using it growing up. It was a great word. Can't use it any more, I'm afraid.
anyone who thinks u should be banned for this is stupid -.- write a support ticket hun this is bs is it a perm ban or 14?
